title: ADC Builsd
body:
So i needa pick up adc. 
Whats the current afk farming adc build?

If you cant beat em, join em.

replies.body:
Sivir and Ezreal. Don't die.

Both usually scale better provided they go even, both are safe. If you're dying in lane as either you're probably not going to win many games.

Then just follow the meta build on probuilds or mobafire or whatever.


AFK adc farming isnt that overpowered though, you'll still lose plenty of games from assassins scaling early and you having no damage till mid-late
